mapper.sql: di_id, common_name, dosage_form, speciflcation, unit_id, coefficient, create_time, modified_time, production_name, commodity_name, serial_number, drug_category, drug_state
mapper.insert: insert into drug_items (di_id, common_name, dosage_form, speciflcation, unit_id, coefficient, create_time, modified_time, production_name, commodity_name, serial_number, drug_category, drug_state) values (#{diId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speciflcation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coefficient,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drugState,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT di.di_id,di.serial_number,di.common_name,di.dosage_form,di.speciflcation, d.dictionaries_name as company,di.coefficient,di.production_name,di.commodity_name,dm.bidding_price ,dic.dictionaries_name as quality_level,dict.dictionaries_name as drug_category,di.drug_state FROM drug_items di LEFT JOIN dictionaries d on di.unit_id = d.dic_id LEFT JOIN drug_message dm on di.di_id = dm.drug_items_id LEFT JOIN dictionaries dic on dm.quality_level = dic.dic_id LEFT JOIN dictionaries dict on di.drug_category = dict.dic_id
mapper.insert: insert into drug_items (di_id, common_name, dosage_form, speciflcation, unit_id, coefficient, create_time, modified_time, production_name, commodity_name, serial_number, drug_category, drug_state) values (#{diId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speciflcation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coefficient,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drugState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update drug_items
common_name = #{commonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dosage_form = #{dosageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speciflcation = #{speciflcation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coefficient = #{coefficient,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
production_name = #{productionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_name = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_category = #{drugCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
drug_state = #{drugState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where di_id = #{diId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update drug_items set common_name = #{commonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosage_form = #{dosageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, speciflcation = #{speciflcation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coefficient = #{coefficient,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, production_name = #{productionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_name = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_category = #{drugCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drug_state = #{drugState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where di_id = #{diId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
